resources.string: Press the button to generate a secure password
Something went wrong! Make sure you have an active internet connect to ping the online generator
Slide to set length of password desired
This app is a multi-purpose wifi tool. It currently supports two features, ANALYZE and GENERATE.

The analyze feature reads your wifi signal strength in dBm. The connectivity is also displayed on a range from 0 (disconnected) to 4. The most accurate indicator is the dBm value. Note that the change is not of a linear type. Do not be worried if your phone doesn\'t display a low value.

The generate feature uses a secure website called "passwd.me" to randomly create a password of chosen length. This does NOT hack a wifi network to extract the password! It\'s purpose is to provide you with a safe password for your own wifi network. Please, do not rate this app poorly because of a misinterpretation!

A third feature, recover, will be released in the next update. It will recover the wifi name, password, and connection type of every network the device has connected to. This will only be supported on ROOTED devices.
To learn more and view my progress, visit or-oz.com/wifi
